categories: Hardware, software or communications equipment and facilities
name: Activity is overlooked or allocated insufficient resources
description: An integral business activity is mismanaged leading to its noncompletion.
notes:
- Is repository responsible for budgetary development and allocation of resources? 

The full description of this risk has been obtained from examples provided in DRAMBORA - Digital Repository Audit Method Based on Risk Assessment, March 2007, Digital Curation Centre (DCC) and Digital Preservation Europe (DPE), http://www.repositoryaudit.eu/
preMitigationNotes:
- Repository budgeting does not include a financial allocation for system security maintenance
- A 0.5 FTE has sole responsibility to ingest 100 objects per day, although it takes on average 30 minutes for an individual to ingest a single object
mitigationStrategy:
Avoidance strategies:
- Derive activities, policies and procedures from fundamental repository objectives
- Allocate resources to correspond with identified activities
- Establish mechanisms to review and adjust resource allocations In the event of riskâ€™s execution:
- Maintain residual fund to facilitate subsequent resourcing of originally overlooked activity
